questionseg1.question: Which statement is true about Java?
questionseg1.option1: a) Java is a sequence-dependent programming language
questionseg1.option2: b) Java is a code dependent programming language
questionseg1.option3: c) Java is a platform-dependent programming language
questionseg1.option4: d) Java is a platform-independent programming language
